name: Heartbeat Singularity (DEMO)
description:
Introduction

Heartbeat Singularity is a slice of life with a hint of lore visual novel that follows Alyn, a journalist, as he travels to a mysterious city state, Terrace City. He is tasked to cover various stories of the city and find out what lies within it.

This demo will cover the prologue and will have 6 possible outcomes. Each decision matters so choose carefully.

Characters
  • Alyn (protagonist):  A meek journalist. He tries his best but most of the time, it's all up to lady luck on how his life turns out.
  • Anson: A local that works in a tucked away book café. He appears intimidating but maybe there's something more underneath that facade.
  • Eva:  A young professor and one of the city's top contributors. She's always welcoming to those that seek knowledge but it's best to tread carefully.
  • Robin:  A friendly local. She's always smiling and is the biggest ball of energy, but is she really?
Dev Note

Thank you very much taking a look at this visual novel! Heartbeat Singularity is a small solo project I started for fun and to try a hand at writing, worldbuilding and making full illustrations. Currently, I'm working on a more polished release of the visual novel with better CGs, backgrounds and hopefully some custom music! This demo will just be a sneak peak and a brief introduction to the characters and, with the right choices, some of the world lore.
